Activities

Invited talks, Seminars and Workshop presentations

Event organised

  • Mini-symposium "Geometric Aspects of Inverse Problems: Non-smooth Regularization and Optimization": Applied Inverse Problems, Grenoble France, July 8-12 2019. Co-organised with: Clarice Poon.
  • Mini-symposium "Approaches for Fast Optimisation in Imaging and Inverse Problems": SIAM Conference on Imaging Science, Bologna Italy, June 5-8 2018. Co-organised with: Mila Nikolova and Carola Schönlieb.

Presentations

  • Trajectory of Alternating Direction Method of Multipliers and Adaptive Acceleration: Workshop on Efficient Algorithms in Data Science, Learning, and Computational Physics, Tsinghua Sanya International Mathematics Forum (TSIMF), Sanya China, January 12-16 2020.
  • Geometry based Acceleration for Non-smooth Optimisation: International Conference on Continuous Optimization (ICCOPT), Berlin Germany, August 5-8 2019.
  • Improving FISTA: Faster, Smarter and Greedier: International Congress on Industrial and Applied Mathematics (ICIAM), Valencia Spain, July 15-19 2019.
  • Local Linear Convergence of Variance Reducing Stochastic Gradient Descent: Applied Inverse Problems (AIP), Grenoble France, July 8-12 2019.
  • Make FISTA Faster Again: IMA and OR Society Conference on Mathematics of Operational Research, Birmingham UK, April 25-26 2019.
  • First-order Proximal Splitting Methods: Geometry and Beyond: Young Mathematician Forum, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Shanghai China, December 21-23 2018.

  • Activity Identification and Local Linear Convergence of Forward–Backward-type Methods: Optimization, Lisbon Portugal, September 6-8 2017.
